create.logic_gauge.gate.or: OR (Activate if any inputs are active)
create.logic_gauge.gate.and: AND (Activate if all inputs are active)
create.logic_gauge.gate.nor: NOR (Activate if all inputs are inactive)
create.logic_gauge.gate.nand: NAND (Activate if any inputs are inactive)
create.logic_gauge.gate.xor: XOR (Activate if active inputs are odd)
create.logic_gauge.gate.xnor: XNOR (Activate if active inputs are even)
create.gui.logic_gauge.title: Connection Settings
create.factory_panel.custom_panel_on_res: Cannot put custom gauges on packager
extra_gauges.ponder.logic_gauge.header: Compact Logical Instructions with Logic Gauges
extra_gauges.ponder.logic_gauge.text_1: Logic Gauges can read redstone information of panel elements...
extra_gauges.ponder.logic_gauge.text_2: And transmit it over to other panel elements
extra_gauges.ponder.logic_gauge.text_3: Reaction to multiple information can be changed by holding right-click
extra_gauges.ponder.logic_gauge.text_4: The logic gate will now output redstone only if all links are active
extra_gauges.ponder.logic_gauge.text_5: Logic gauges can interact with factory gauges as well
create.integer_gauge.mode.subtract: SUBTRACT (Sums all inputs but gives negative result)
create.comparator_gauge.mode.greater_equ: Input is greater than or equals Value
create.comparator_gauge.mode.less_equals: Input is less than or equals Value
